description.displayText: Tijana has been an indispensable member to our caregiver team.    She stepped in quickly learning my mother's needs and routine.  Unfortunately, COVID hit some of our other caregivers shortly after Tijana started.    Lucky for us, Tijana was extremely flexible and accommodating picking up shifts even at a moments notice.   We are thrilled to have her caring for my mom.
description.originalText: Tijana has been an indispensable member to our caregiver team.    She stepped in quickly learning my mother's needs and routine.  Unfortunately, COVID hit some of our other caregivers shortly after Tijana started.    Lucky for us, Tijana was extremely flexible and accommodating picking up shifts even at a moments notice. description.displayText: Tijana has been an amazing help!!!  I highly recommend her services.  A+++.  She is extremely friendly, thoughtful, helpful, and reliable.  She thinks well on her feet and anticipates your needs.  She helped collect me at the hospital and run errands for me as I had foot surgery recently so wasn't able to perform basic tasks.  I would definitely use her again as she is completely dependable with a friendly, cheerful disposition.  Thank you Tijana!
